TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler(object sender, DataObjectSettingDataEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataObjectSettingDataEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The object where the event handler is attached.
Docs.summary: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.SettingData> event occurs when an attempt is made to add a data format to the data object during a copy operation.
A <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.SettingData> event handler method is typically used to apply copy command optimization by filtering unwanted or unneeded data formats from being applied to a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject>.
